resources.string:
* You should now be able to chat with your comrades!
* Added the ability to view profiles
* Added a few posts to the statistics view
* Longpress on your friends in the COM CENTER for actions!

* A few minor bugfixes here and there

Please report any errors you may encounter to support@ninetwozero.com and/or @karllindmark on Twitter.

Thank you for your support!
